WorkItem.Description: It seems that Rawr has misplaced the item entirely. Do a check for it around the level of the mercurial alchemist's stone, since it effectively gives 90 AP due to the agility (for hunters), 180 for other classes... And it just doesn't appear. Looked up, looked down, nothing.
WorkItem.Summary: Darkmoon Card: Greatness, where art thou?

Comments.Message: Well, first check if it's in your item cache. Tools > Edit Items. If not, add it. The proc effect on it may not be modeled for hunters as well; if it's not, then just set it to 180agi instead of 90agi as a decent approximation until we get it modeled.
Have done so, it seems it was just not modelled for hunters. Thanks for the update.
